text: Arra wa ningen no (gense ni okeru heian no) tame, seinaru ie, kaba o tsukuri, mata Midzuki to sasagemono to (gisei ni sonaeru kachiku no) kubikazari o sadame rareta. Kore wa anata gata ni, arra ga ten ni ari-chi ni aru subete no mono o shitte ora re, katsu arra ga subete no koto ni tsugyo shite ora reru koto o, shiraseru tamedearu
